evaluate

public boolean evaluate(java.lang.Number[] numbers)
Description copied from interface: CSPOMConstraint
Evaluates a given instantiation.

Parameters:
numbers - the instantiation to evaluate. For all i, getScope()[i].contains(numbers[i]).
Returns:
true iff the constraint allows the instantiation

standardize

public CSPOMConstraint standardize(CSPOMVariable[] scope)
Description copied from interface: CSPOMConstraint
Permutes the scope of the constraint according to the given array of variables.

Parameters:
scope - The new permutation of the scope of the constraint.
Returns:
A copy of the constraint with the permuted scope.
